meta_description: "Upgrade your bathroom with this 60in. vanity set featuring a 1.1811in. thick vanity top, 2 basins, and 4 doors. Made of solid wood, it includes cabinet hardware and soft close hinges. Sink and vanity top included. No assembly required. 5 year limited commercial warranty. From the transitional Patzi collection, made in Vietnam. Rear drain placement and 3 faucet holes for widespread mounting. Finished back and hidden drawers. Sink made of vitreous china. 25 year limited manufacturer warranty."
meta_title: "Patzi 60" Double Basin Vanity Set with Cabinet and Vanity Top - Includes 3 Faucet Centers"
details:
Complete an alluring primary suite with the Patzi. Teeming with natural warmth, the cabinet features a basket weave inlay pattern for added textural charm. Polishing off the look, sleek cabinet hardware and feet offer a glam touch. The Patzi opens up to three drawers and two spacious cabinets with adjustable shelves, making it easy to customize to your shared and individual storage needs. Thanks to soft-closing hinges and slides, the vanity's frame is protected while ensuring smooth, quiet operation.

Included Components:

  • Covered under Signature Hardware's 25 year limited warranty
  • Wood vanity cabinet with 4 doors, 3 drawers, and 2 shelves
  • Vanity top with two sinks and backsplash
  • Faucet is not included and must be purchased separately

Signature Hardware 954035-60-RUMB-8 Features:

  • Basket weave pattern
  • Full extension drawer slides
  • Includes a matching backsplash and Vitreous China sinks
  • Each vanity top is carved from a single piece of stone and will feature natural variations
  • All dimensions are +/- 1/2"

Cabinet Features:

  • Constructed from wood providing a lifetime of durability
  • Free standing installation - vanity is seated on the floor with wall anchors, providing a functional design
  • 4 door design provides easy access to storage space
  • 3 full extension drawers with soft-close slides allows for organized storage
  • Soft close drawer slides operate on smooth ball-bearings and prevent drawers from slamming shut
  • Vanity cabinet includes matching decorative hardware
  • Vanity will ship fully assembled

Vanity Top Features:

  • Vanity top includes 2 sinks
  • 3 pre-drilled faucet holes per basin
  • Each sink features its own rectangular single basin workspace
  • Rear drain location increases available space under the sink
  • Equipped with an overflow drain to help prevent water overflow and spillage from occurring
  • Vanity top includes matching backsplash

Cabinet Specifications:

  • Cabinet Width: 58" (left to right)
  • Cabinet Height: 34-1/8" (top to bottom)
  • Cabinet Depth: 21" (front to back)
  • Number of Doors: 4
  • Number of Drawers: 3
  • Number of Shelves: 2

Vanity Top Specifications:

  • Vanity Top Width: 61" (left edge to right edge)
  • Vanity Top Depth: 22" (front edge to back edge)
  • Backsplash Height: 4"
  • Number of Basins: 2
  • Sink Dimensions: 14-1/4"W x 18-1/4"L
  • Sink Cutout Length: 15" (left to right)
  • Sink Cutout Width: 11" (front to back)
  • Sink Basin Dimensions: 15-3/4" L x 11-7/8" W x 4-1/8" D
  • Number of Faucet Holes: 3
  • Faucet Centers: 8" (distance between the installation holes for the faucet handles)
